rows.label: tlk4532019302_msg0001
rows.name:
This was the main battlefield of
the great war 500 years ago.

rows.label: tlk4532019302_msg0002
rows.name:
The scars of the conflict
back then are still plain
to see in the terrain.

rows.label: tlk4532019302_msg0003
rows.name:
The place names are often related to
events back then as well, but nobody
knows the full stories behind them.

rows.label: tlk4532019302_msg0004
rows.name:
If somebody were to excavate the
ruins of the Lost Capital Judicium,
maybe we could learn more.
